data.title: Shahid Azim on LinkedIn: AI in the Built World: Architecture, Civil Engg., Construction
data.meta_description: We are thrilled at the response to this MIT Media lab event and heartening to see the interest of explorations at the intersection of AI and BuiltWorld. We‚Ä¶
data.text:
üöÄ Get ready! Startup Boston Week is just 55 DAYS AWAY, showcasing 250 thought leaders and luminaries from Greater #Boston and #NewEngland's startup scene! Explore 100+ FREE sessions including panels, workshops, keynotes, and networking events. It's your chance to connect with the ENTIRE #startup community. Meet some of the incredible minds you'll learn from below and grab your FREE ticket here üòéüëâ https://lnkd.in/e3E4CRfz Don't miss out ‚Äì this is THE week for #startups to unite across all industries, departments, and funding stages. See you at Suffolk University (or virtually)! üéâ ‚û°Ô∏èYvonne Hao - Secretary of the Executive Office of Economic Development, Commonwealth of Massachusetts Serves in the Governor's Office, bringing extensive experience from roles at Cove Hill Partners, PillPack and Bain Capital, and served on boards at companies such as CarGurus and ZipRecruiter. ‚û°Ô∏èScott Kirsner - Columnist, Boston Globe Media A business journalist and contributing editor for two decades, writing for notable publications like the Boston Globe, Wired, and The New York Times and Co-founded The Innovation Trail of Greater Boston ‚û°Ô∏èBrian Liu - Founder, LegalZoom.com Founded LegalZoom in 1999, transforming it into the most recognized legal brand in the US. His current venture, Overture Law, is a lawyer-to-lawyer referral platform ‚û°Ô∏èStacy Swider - VP Investments, MassVentures Leverages her background in commercializing novel materials and equipment to source, mentor, and fund deep-tech startups in #Massachusetts ‚û°Ô∏èKeisha Greaves - CEO & Founder, Girls Chronically Rock Founded her organization to support those with chronic illnesses and promote inclusive fashion through the GCR Adaptive Project and Trust Your Abilities Nonprofit. ‚û°Ô∏èJon McNeill - CEO & Co-Founder, DVx Ventures As former President of Tesla and COO of Lyft, he is currently the CEO of DVx Ventures, a venture platform focusing on early and growth-stage companies ‚û°Ô∏èMichael Krigsman - Publisher & Host, CXOTalk Globally recognized analyst and commentator on digital transformation and leadership, interviewing top business leaders worldwide. ‚û°Ô∏èTasneem Dohadwala - Founding Partner, Excelestar Ventures LLC Focuses on investing in medical technology and deep tech startups, advancing women's leadership in business ‚û°Ô∏èShahid Azim - CEO & General Partner, C10 Labs specializes in scaling AI startups and has founded multiple successful ventures from concept to impactful products AND learn from: üî•Jessica Fracalossi - Founder, Head of Brand & Marketing, The Handle Bar | CYCLE | SCULPT | STRENGTH | FLOW üî•Julia Rodgers, Esq. - CEO & Founder, HelloPrenup üî•Giuseppe Stuto - Managing Partner, 186 Ventures üî•Jean Donnelly (She/Her) - COO, Sandbox Banking üî•Courtney Utsey, SPHR - Director of People Experience üî•Jashin Lin - Founder & CEO, Growbie Read the full press release: https://lnkd.in/e7xwPRFd #SBW2024 #networking

Upcoming: Growing #Massachusetts #Manufacturing with #AI. A workforce development workshop for manufacturing executives and directors. In Massachusetts, manufacturing is a powerhouse, generating over $56 billion in revenue and employing 6% of the Commonwealth's workforce. At C10, we believe the future of manufacturing lies in innovation, and we‚Äôre excited to introduce The Kendall Project, a complimentary workshop designed to empower manufacturing executives and teams with the knowledge and tools to identify and prioritize AI opportunities within their organizations to grow and protect our workforce. Why should you attend? Comprehensive Training: Our sessions will guide you through the intricacies of AI, ensuring you can make informed decisions that align with your strategic goals. Learn to spot and evaluate potential AI applications in your field. Exclusive Market Insights: Gain access to future scenarios and trends in AI from the experts at C10 Labs Kendall Square‚Äôs AI First Venture Studio. Understand where the industry is headed and how you can stay ahead of the curve. Networking Opportunities: Connect with other industry leaders, share your challenges, and collaborate on innovative solutions. Our workshops foster a community of forward-thinking executives ready to drive change. What makes The Kendall Project unique? We integrate multiple proven methodologies to ensure a structured, effective approach to problem-solving and strategic decision-making: Our interactive workshops are not just about learning‚Äîthey're about doing. You'll participate in hands-on sessions, data collection, and analysis to produce comprehensive needs benchmarking reports. Plus, you'll receive expert insights and access to exclusive data sets. Imagine the strategic advantage of enhanced knowledge of AI technologies and applications, coupled with data-driven insights and a robust network of industry peers. This is your opportunity to lead the charge in manufacturing innovation. Ready to take the next step? Message C10 Labs and we'll send you a link for the workshop! #AI #ManufacturingInnovation #KendallSquare #C10labs Brendan McSheffrey Beth Porter Shahid Azim David Berlin GBMP Consulting Group & The Northeast Lean Conference Bruce Hamilton
